page_content:
Content IndexAdvancing Humanity 
Since our founding, KLA has used our expertise and innovative 
thinking to overcome monumental challenges and improve 
lives. Our work is ongoing—a journey of discoveries that 
holds the key to a more fulfilling future. By making strides 
in innovation, stewardship, opportunity and leadership, we 
continue to advance humanity with technologies that touch 
lives and ideas that inspire action.We believe in the power of people, innovation 
and technology to take humanity where it has 
never gone before.
